programme.sub-title: Minnesota Twins at New York Yankees
programme.desc: The Twins seek their first win against the Yankees in over two years as they begin a three-game set. New York swept all six clashes with Minnesota last season. Giancarlo Stanton hit .421 with two homers and six RBIs against the Twins in 2024.
